HacknetExtension.WorkshopDescription:
[h1]#Hackerjam2[/h1]
[b] Warning: this Extension is not recommended for kids under age of 16 and people who suffer from epilepsy[/b]
You were always dreaming about hacking skills? But sometimes, you forget that it is an illegal activity.
Luckily, You can become a Captain of San-Francisco CyberPolice Department to prevail justice in digital space!
Your name is Cypher Mendes and your job is to catch filthy criminals who use 21st century technologies to hurt other people. You are not alone as well! Your team of digital enforcers will join you on your way to justice!
But sooner or later you will receive a case of your life And there is a chance that it will be [i]too much[/i] for you to bear
Will you remain dignity and justice facing vile evil? Or will become a part of it as well with horrible consequences...
This Extension features: - 4 endings of a thrilling story - Karma system, that remembers your actions and displays different content - 3+hours of gameplay - Awesome music - Questionable choices - Voice Acting - And more!
[b]Nexus Mods Page: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/hacknet/mods/34]https://www.nexusmods.com/hacknet/mods/34[/url][/b]
